text: I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean is the Pirate King!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

text: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

text: When do you think people die? When they are shot with a bullet? No. When they eat a soup made from a poisonous mushroom? No! People die... when they are forgotten!
author: Dr. Hiluluk

text: No matter how hard or how impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

text: Living is important! It's because one lives, one can enjoy things! Everyone has the right to live!
author: Rebecca

text: Forget the past! We don't need it! Look forward!
author: Roronoa Zoro

text: Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

text: Stop counting only those things you have lost! What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this. What is there... that still remains to you?!
author: Jinbei

text: You can't get back what you've lost, what's important now is what is it that you still have.
author: Jinbei

text: I want to live!
author: Nico Robin

text: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
author: Brook

text: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

text: There is no such thing as being born into the world to be alone.
author: Jaguar D. Saul

text: We shouldn't worry about being able to achieve our dreams, as long as we have the desire to do it!
author: Coby

text: If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn't have any in the first place.
author: Fujitora

text: Death is never an apology.
author: Brook

text: There comes a time when a man has to stand and fight! This is the time when his friends dreams are laughed at! Luffy won't die. I know he'll be the Pirate King.
author: Usopp

text: If you hurt somebody or if somebody hurts you, the same red blood will be shed.
author: Shanks

text: It's not about whether it's possible or not, I'm doing it because I want to.
author: Roronoa Zoro

text: It may be hard right now... but you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone!
author: Jinbei

text: I am not the least afraid of a fight. I am willing to put my life on the line in order to achieve it.
author: Sanji

text: It's not some kid's game anymore. You either win or you die.
author: Shanks

text: People's dreams... have no ends!
author: Marshall D. Teach

text: Sometimes the only thing you have to doubt is your own common sense.
author: Nami

text: If you hurt somebody or if somebody hurts you, the same red blood will be shed.
author: Shanks

text: The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die.
author: Trafalgar D. Water Law

text: People's dreams... have no ends.
author: Marshall D. Teach

text: Don't start a fight if you can't end it.
author: Sanji

text: Fools who don't respect the past are likely to repeat it.
author: Nico Robin

text: Don't forget to live well! That's the best revenge.
author: Ifrit

text: If you want to protect what's important to you, you must first deal with your enemies.
author: Luffy

text: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

text: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
author: Brook

text: The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die.

text: There is no such thing as being born into the world to be alone.
author: Jaguar D. Saul

text: The people who have lost their dreams will rally around others who still have them.
